DOC.brief_summary: Tampere Traumatic head brain injury study prospective study aim explore neuroradiological , neuropsychological , neurological biochemical aspect mild traumatic brain injury ( mtbi ) . The main interest factor effect outcome mtbi . The study conduct Tampere University Hospital 's emergency department 1st August 2010 31st July 2013 .
DOC.brief_title: Tampere Traumatic Head Brain Injury Study
DOC.detailed_description: Aims study : 1 . To improve clinical assessment mTBI acute phase 2 . To assemble good knowledge diffusion tensor image diagnostic tool mTBI 3 . To improve neuropsychological evaluation mTBI Main focus psychosocial functioning / outcome / correlate E.g . Resilience , PTSD
DOC.criteria: WHO 's mtbi criterion Inhabitant Pirkanmaa hospital district Age 18 60 year Detrimental alcohol use Drug addiction Chronic neurological disease Earlier brain injury Diagnosed psychiatric disease Hearing sight deficiency Native language finnish
